reviewText: if this were made by disney, it would be an awesome movie

Loved it!  As a golfer and a grandparent, I enjoyed watching this movie with my grandchildren.  It was somewhat predictable, but still heartwarming and contained a good message.  A reminder to all of us to get our priorities straight.
It was okay, but not really an adult movie.  Should have researched it a bit more before decided to rent, which I did because it was about golf.

A slow moving, mostly boring film.  The acting is mediocre and the music is often too loud and poorly chosen.
The ending is the best part of the film.
I don't recommend seeing this movie.
Such a wholesome family movie.  The jokes were well placed, great actors including the kids.  Love Natalie Imbruglia in this movie.  I didn't know she acted!
